name: Girl Games Art Nail Painting 2017
description:
Hello ladies, we are happy to provide you a very nice game.

Would you like to polish colorful nails in your own beauty salon?

Manicure
Pedicure
Nail Polishing
colorful rainbow colors and ready-to-use stickers
Different Slipper Models
Different Tattoo Models

How to Play the Game;
You can choose the foot model among from three different models. You can cut the nails after you wash the foot and rinse it. Now you can start polishing in accordance with your taste and then you can wear any slipper and tattoo model you want.

For these and a lot more you can download the Beach Foot SPA game for free.

Have fun!
